name: Professional Portfolio Website
description: The website you're currently viewing! A modern, responsive portfolio website built with SvelteKit 5 and Skeleton UI.

name: Game Recommender
description: A full-stack application that helps users discover games suited to their preferences through a preference-based recommendation engine. Features data integration from multiple sources including APIs and custom web scrapers.

name: AI Freeze Tag Simulation
description: Senior project simulating AI agents competing in Freeze Tag. Implements multiple search algorithms and heuristics for decision-making, with hunters pursuing runners who attempt to reach safe zones using adaptive pathfinding strategies.

name: Discord Bots
description: Collection of Discord bots for server automation including voice chat notifications, Twitch stream alerts, and a music bot with song queuing functionality. Built for personal server management and community engagement.

name: Advent of Code Solutions
description: Solutions to Advent of Code programming challenges across multiple years. Organized repository with utility scripts for generating new day folders and maintaining solutions in Python and Ruby.

name: Neovim Configuration
description: Custom Neovim setup built on LazyVim with LSP integration, GitHub Copilot support, and optimized keymaps. Features custom configurations for code intelligence, formatting, and note-taking with ZK integration.
